member.name: M:Kernel.Utilities.ObjectUtilities.GetHandle(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets a handle for the specified object - basically, a round-about way of casting an object to a pointer.
member.remarks: All the plug does is to set the return value to the argument value!
member.param: The object to get a handle of.

member.name: M:Kernel.Utilities.ObjectUtilities.GetObject(System.Void*)
member.summary: Gets an object for the specified pointer - basically, a round-about way of casting a pointer to an object.
member.remarks: All the plug does is to set the return value to the argument value!
member.param: The pointer to get an object of.
member.returns: The object the pointer points to.
